description:
Barrett decided he wanted to do more, and I noticed that he liked to be a little dominated.
Stash showed up with a robe. He's trying to come up with different ideas or themes and a massage what he thought he could do.
I wasn't really setup to do a massage table scene, and I ended up cutting a chunk of the actual massage. I try to jump right to the action!
Stash got his robe off, leaving the belt/sash thing just laying there, begging to be used. So we get a bit of lite bondage in this one. It's pretty hot as Stash takes control and has Barrett suck his dick and then him while somewhat trussed up.
Barrett turns the table on him and entwines Stash with it, fucking him doggy style. Yeah, it's very tame bondage, but it does add a little sumfin' to the feel of the video.
The cumshot is fun to watch 'cuz Stash is trying really hard to NOT nut. He slows down...slows doooown..slows down..and just gives up and lets it fly!
I immediately got worried as Barrett is in fact straight, and having another dude spooge on them can be a buzz kill. But he kept at it and sure enough he rubbed one out, not minding in the least some guy had spilled on him.
Go figure.
title: Barrett & Stash - Wrapped
